SEARCH
Package net.delugan.teachly.user

Interface UserRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<User,UUID>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<User,UUID>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<User,UUID>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<User,UUID>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<User,UUID>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<User>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<User,UUID>
public interface UserRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<User,UUID>
Repository interface for accessing and managing User entities. Extends JpaRepository to inherit standard CRUD operations.

  • Method Details

    • findByEmail

      Optional<User> findByEmail(String email)
      Finds a user by their email address.
      Parameters:
      email - The email address to search for
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the user if found, or empty if not found

    • findByGoogleId

      Optional<User> findByGoogleId(String sub)
      Finds a user by their Google ID (sub).
      Parameters:
      sub - The Google ID to search for
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the user if found, or empty if not found

    • getByOAuth2

      default User getByOAuth2(org.springframework.security.oauth2.core.user.OAuth2User oAuth2User)
      Gets a user from an OAuth2User object. Extracts the Google ID (sub) from the OAuth2User and finds the corresponding user.
      Parameters:
      oAuth2User - The OAuth2User to get the user for
      Returns:
      The corresponding User entity
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - If no user is found

    • findAllWithoutEmail

      default List<User> findAllWithoutEmail()
      Finds all users and removes their email addresses for privacy. Used when returning user lists to clients that shouldn't see email addresses.
      Returns:
      A list of all users with email addresses set to null

    • findByIdWithoutEmail

      default Optional<User> findByIdWithoutEmail(UUID id)
      Finds a user by ID and removes their email address for privacy. Used when returning a user to clients that shouldn't see the email address.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the user to find
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the user with email set to null if found, or empty if not found
